title: Fix deployment and add authentication with guest mode

requirements.text: Fix deployment issue preventing the application from being accessible, ensuring the app deploys correctly and is reachable at the deployment URL without showing 'No live apps yet' error

quotes: Go live with an app now

acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully without errors
Deployment URL loads the application home page
No 'No live apps yet' error appears
All static assets (images, styles) load correctly

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity authentication system that allows users to log in securely using their existing accounts (Google, Apple, Microsoft) through Internet Identity integration

quotes: sign up nhi ho rha h
Authentication fix: Internet Identity integration properly add करूंगा

acceptanceCriteria: Internet Identity login button is visible on the application
Users can successfully authenticate using Google, Apple, or Microsoft accounts via Internet Identity
Authentication state persists across page refreshes
Authenticated users can access their personalized data and progress

requirements.text: Add Guest Mode that allows users to explore and use all application features without requiring authentication or account creation

quotes: Guest Mode: बिना login के भी app explore कर सकें

acceptanceCriteria: A 'Continue as Guest' or 'Try Without Login' option is prominently displayed
Guest users can access all vocabulary categories
Guest users can complete quizzes and see immediate results
Guest mode provides clear indication that progress won't be saved
Guest users can later choose to create an account to save their progress

requirements.text: Implement backend progress tracking system that persists completed lessons, quiz scores, earned badges, and activity completion status for authenticated users

quotes: Progress Tracking: Logged-in users के लिए lessons, quiz scores, earned badges और completed activities save होंगी backend में

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores completed lessons per user and category
Quiz scores and attempts are saved and retrievable
Earned badges and stars persist across sessions
Progress data is associated with the authenticated user's identity
Users can view their historical progress and achievements

requirements.text: Connect frontend progress tracking components to the backend storage system so that authenticated users' progress data is loaded on login and updated after each activity completion
acceptanceCriteria: ProgressDisplay component shows data from backend for authenticated users
RewardsBadge component displays earned badges stored in backend
Quiz completion triggers backend API call to save score and progress
Dashboard loads user's current progress state on mount
Progress updates reflect immediately in the UI after activities

constraints: Do not modify any files in frontend/src/components/ui
Use existing backend authorization and role-based access control patterns
nonGoals: Implementing authentication methods other than Internet Identity
Creating parent dashboard or separate parent accounts
Adding email notifications or SMS messaging
